name: Temple of GUN
description: Its a tiny game about flying by shooting your gun. It was made for the "GDQ One mechanic game jam". No idea what else to say. I probably should have went witha a shooter instead of a platformer but i wanted to deviate from my usual arcadey, random levely, shootery game kind of stuff and try to make a platformer! And now i know for sure that i probably shouldnt make platformer games, or at least one-screen platformer games as i suck at level design :c .
